assumptions_made.description: Assumed ioredis is already installed. If not, needs `npm install ioredis`.
Stopped using global Singleton redis in favor of instantiating it inside MemoryFirstCache with fixed retry limits.

innovations_proposed.description: TokenBucketQueue logic implemented purely in local RAM instead of Redis. Uses Node.js Event Loop to yield promises via an asynchronous Array queue.
innovations_proposed.benefit: Prevents LLM queuing mechanisms from adding any footprint to Redis, allowing absolute scaling of delayed LLM requests without crashing the DB.

innovations_proposed.description: Hybrid L1 eviction strategy. Combines Max-Entries check with a hard Max-Memory (Bytes Stringified) estimation.
innovations_proposed.benefit: Prevents memory leaks in Node.js OOM crashes when processing extremely large JSON payloads from LLM responses.

open_questions: Should we write actual Vitest files for M0 or proceed directly to Module 1 code logic to save prompt context?
Do you want me to automatically install `ioredis` and `zod` via terminal before executing subsequent modules?
next_module_prerequisites: Go-ahead to build Module 1 (Flow Control + Efficiency)
